O2.summary: Claim the Bounty's Reward from Comdt. Sanita

description.S1: McRedd gave you his lucky lighter to give to Sanita.
description.S2: Go turn it in to resolve his bounty.

blurb.B1: Turn the lighter in to Commandant Sanita to claim the bounty.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: How goes the hunt? I've been ruminating on it, and I decided - if you ain't killed MacRedd yet, I want you to hurt him a little before you do.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Nothing excessive, mind you. But the scoundrel deserves a light beating at least before he kicks off.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Captain MacRedd is completely dead. Here's his lucky lighter as proof.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Forget about the bounty for now. I want to talk with you about something else.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Does this have anything to do with your "carnal understanding"?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm working on it.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Here's the bounty pay-out. Nice work down there. With any luck, we can hire more sharp-eyed bounty hunters like you in the future.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Unless you're here to file an incident report or to inquire about the bounty posting, I must kindly ask you to clear out. The Mardet's offices aren't for leisure time nor loitering.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: So what's it like, working security detail on a space station?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll be on my way.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Do I look like your gossipy best friend? While I'm on post, I take my duties real serious. I would have no qualms whatsoever escorting you to a cell. Understand?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Fine, fine.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Whoa, all right. Just trying to make conversation.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Hey! No one talks to me like that.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Then get to business or get moving.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'm not here for a chat. Now get moving before I see you moved.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Now, let's not start a fuss. I'm just trying to do my job, and I can't do it while chit-chatting with you.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: Have at it, then.

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: He tell you that, did he?

dialog.speaker: EllenChawla (Female)
dialog.utterance: I might'a kicked his ass from one end of the Groundbreaker to the other a few years back. Whatever he reads into that is his business.
